text: <@U07M1K8759T> there are 2 separate betas running at the moment. 1 for private app development with projects and UIE and 2 for public app development with projects and UIE

developer accounts can only be used with public apps, which will require you to apply for access and receive approval from our team before you can use these tools with your account. There should be a link from your "home" page (<https://app.HubSpot.com/developer/<account_id>/home>) to request access and then you will receive a notification if you are approved

There are differences between public and private app development that will require you to refactor an app built for a customer account (like a developer test account) to one used for public installation (using a developer account)
